item.title: Shiny App for Modeling Heterozygosity Remaining
item.description: One way that biologists measure genetic diversity loss over time is heterozygosity loss. Heterozygosity is having different alleles at any given loci. For instance, at a given loci, Aa is demonstarting heterozygosity, while AA or aa would be demonstrating homozygosity. Having the two different alleles is a good indicator of genetic diversity, so we can look at what percentage of a particular population is demonstrating heterozygosity to determine that populationâ€™s genetic viability.
